mapper.insert: INSERT INTO produce.produce_information (produceId, produceName, produceIndustry, deviceNode, accessProtocol, networkingMode, produceModel, produceDescription) VALUES (#{produceId}, #{produceName}, #{produceIndustry}, #{deviceNode}, #{accessProtocol}, #{networkingMode}, #{produceModel}, #{produceDescription})
